attributes.action: Instead of Red Nose Day this year raise money to put back into the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Instead of Red Nose Day this year raise money for the NHS put something back in we rely on the NHS when we’re all I’ll they deserve to have what they need when they need it it will make NHS run more smoothly they have been amazing through this pandemic and they deserve more than a clap don’t ever forget the daily struggles NHS face we as a country need to help and raising money will
attributes.background: We as a country have gone through this pandemic of covid 19 and with the help from the NHS many have survived but sadly many have lost there lives the struggle NHS are facing is terrible waiting for PPE it should be there we need the NHS so we need to help them as they help us when we need them.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
Designate a day for the recognition of our NHS and all Emergency Services.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308614

Red Nose Day is organised by Comic Relief, not the UK Government or Parliament. You can find out more about this here: https://www.comicrelief.com/rednoseday/

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
